notes: • Renamed from Synapser to Blaze Launcher.
• Revamped the user interface for better usability.
• Added a news section to keep users informed about updates and features.
• Added a indicator to show when an update is available, per application.
• Added a Latest Update section per application to show recent changes.
• Added a button to join our Discord server for support and community interaction.
• Changed the Channel Environment and the launch button position for a stacked layout.
• Fixed a issue where the dropdown menu for selecting the application environment would not remember the last selected option.
